title: Miser's Purse, 1820–40
description: Netted white silk ornamented evenly with gold beads in small cone pattern.  Two hexagonal gold rings engraved with floral and scroll motifs, control a side opening.  Long tassels of gold beads at each end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, 1820–40.
1820–40. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: netting. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-97.
